name: apex-accessibility
description: Pa11y Dashboard is a visual web interface to the Pa11y accessibility reporter
author: Team Pa11y

scripts.dev: (cd 'puppeteer-api' && npm start && cd ..) & (cd 'http-observatory-website' && npm run watch && cd ..) & (cd 'apex-accessibilty-tool' && PORT=8080 node index.js && cd ..)
scripts.install: (cd 'puppeteer-api' && npm install && cd ..) & (cd 'http-observatory-website' && npm install && cd ..) & (cd 'apex-accessibilty-tool' && npm install && cd ..)
